Producer: Kim Roberts, Peter Burgess Smith, Eli B. Despres
Synopsis: Ruth (Jeanette Brox), Deb (Megan Henning) and Kate (Ali Humiston) are three teens enjoying a weekend getaway at a remote mountain cabin. Their fun is interrupted by the intrusion of a stranger (James Morrison), who may or may not be responsible for an unsolved murder nearby.
Title: Wilderness Survival for Girls
